title: Grain Storage | Storage Hygiene and Structural Treatments

tasks.task: Clean and treat grain storage facilities for pest prevention
subtasks: Sweep spilt grain around silos and storage areas
Clean headers, chaser bins, trailers, and other equipment used in grain handling
Remove and dispose of waste grain properly
Apply diatomaceous earth (DE) as a structural treatment inside grain silos and equipment
Use a flow gun or compressed air to apply DE evenly to silo walls, roof, and base
Apply DE as a dust or slurry to machinery and structures near grain storage
Wear personal protective equipment (dust mask, gloves, goggles) when applying DE
Rinse grain silos with water before storing pulses or oilseeds to remove DE residues
Apply DE treatments approximately 10 days before harvest for optimal grain protection
